data.description: Object interface for AF_INET6 domain sockets
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides an object interface to creating and using
    sockets in the AF_INET6 domain and it is built upon the IO::Socket
    interface and inherits all the methods defined by IO::Socket.

    The interface for AF_INET domain is already exist in
    IO::Socket::INET. And IO::Socket::INET6 does work sameness
    IO::Socket::INET. Please grant me using IO::Socket::INET6.
